act:
1553334 THE PRE- NATAL DIAGNOSTIC TECHNIQUES (REGULATION AND PREVENTION OFMISUSE) AMENDMENT ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 32 OF 2001 [ 3rd September, 2001.]
An Act to amend the Pre- natal Diagnostic Techniques (Regulation and Prevention of Misuse) Act, 1994.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1846577 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Pre- natal Diagnostic Techniques (Regulation and Prevention of Misuse) Amendment Act, 2001.
1629101 2 Amendment of section 8 of Act 57 of 1994.- In the Pre- natal Diagnostic Techniques (Regulation and Prevention of Misuse) Act, 1994, in section 8, in sub- section
1682157 1in clause (a),-
814704 ithe word" and" shall be omitted;
328769 iithe following proviso shall be inserted, namely:- " Provided that the term of office of a member elected under clause (f) of sub- section (2) of section 7 shall come to an end as soon as the member becomes a Minister or Minister of State or Deputy Minister, or the Speaker or the Deputy Speaker of the Hous of the People, or the Deputy Chairman of the Council of States or ceases to be a member of the House from which she was elected; and".
SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
